description: Dilendra Prasad Badu is a Nepalese politician who has served in various high-ranking positions, including Minister for Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs, and Minister of Industry, Commerce and Supplies. He has been elected to the House of Representatives multiple times representing the Darchula district and the Nepali Congress party. A member of the party's central working committee since 2003, he also served as its spokesperson from 2010 to 2016. Before his political career began in 1989, Badu worked in academia as a teacher and later as a campus chief for Tribhuvan University.
short_description: Nepalese politician, multi-term Member of Parliament, and government minister affiliated with the Nepali Congress party.
